quote: Life is much more successfully looked at from a single window.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Success is built sequentially. It's one thing at a time.
author: Gary Keller

quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: Everyone can rise above their circumstances and achieve success if they are dedicated to and passionate about what they do.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Success seems to be connected to action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success is never final; failure is never fatal.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Successful people tend to become more successful because they are always thinking about their successes.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Success is good at any age, but the sooner you find it, the longer you will enjoy it.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed; pay the price and it is yours.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: One's best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
author: Colin R. Davis

quote: The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Failure is a prerequisite for great success. If you want success faster, double your rate of failure.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: There is little success where there is little laughter.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The way of success is the way of continuous pursuit of knowledge.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Successful people are not without problems. They're simply people who've learned to solve their problems.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Success is within the reach of just about everyone.
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: Enthusiasm is a vital element toward the individual success of every man or woman.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is doing what you want to do, when you want, where you want, with whom you want, as much as you want.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
author: W.P. Kinsella

quote: Judge your success by what you had to give up in order to get it.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Failure is the highway to success.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Success is a poor teacher.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Your success and happiness lie in you.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Confidence is not a guarantee of success, but a pattern of thinking that will improve your likelihood of success, a tenacious search for ways to make things work.
author: John Eliot

quote: Most people achieved their greatest success one step beyond what looked like their greatest failure.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Sometimes success isn't about making the right decision, it's more about making some decision.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.
author: Robert Collier
